duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage surveillance activities to ensure the safety and security of guests and team members.
Create an atmosphere that encourages guests to choose the venue for gaming entertainment.
Train, motivate, evaluate, and supervise staff to ensure effective accomplishment of objectives.
Maintain current information on local criminal activity and develop and maintain communications with law enforcement agencies.
Resolve guest complaints and ensure the highest level of guest service is provided at all times.
Maintain a high level of awareness of criminal and civil laws as it pertains to the establishment and conduct investigations where required.
Prepare complete and accurate reports to ensure that management is kept abreast of security-related incidents.
Attend and participate in meetings, completing follow-up as assigned.

education_certification.credential: One-year certificate from college or technical school; or one to three years related experience and /or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience. Casino systems and MS applications including Word and Excel. Previous casino surveillance experience 20/20 corrected vision required.
